entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 5 except plus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain ending this afternoon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5 except plus 2 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 04 May 2016
